meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hearty.
meanings.sent1: Her heartiness was evident in the way she greeted everyone with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: The family reunion was filled with laughter and heartiness.
meanings.sent3: His heartiness at the dinner table made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The heartiness of the old tree trunk showed its resilience to the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The heartiness of her laughter echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being warm and friendly.
meanings.sent1: The heartiness of the welcome made the guests feel instantly at home.
meanings.sent2: The heartiness of the host put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent3: The heartiness of the puppy's wagging tail melted everyone's heart.
meanings.sent4: The heartiness of the handshake conveyed genuine warmth.
meanings.sent5: The heartiness of her hug was comforting and sincere.

meanings.definition: The quality of being strong and healthy.
meanings.sent1: The heartiness of the athlete was evident in his performance on the field.
meanings.sent2: The heartiness of the soup made with fresh vegetables was nourishing.
meanings.sent3: The heartiness of the oak tree's trunk showed its robust nature.
meanings.sent4: The heartiness of her constitution allowed her to recover quickly from illness.
meanings.sent5: The heartiness of his voice filled the room with energy and vitality.
